title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Resident Post
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD, DNB can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address...
